comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: From Kirribilli, looking east over Careening Cove, Neutral Bay towards Bradleys Head. The house with balcony (Southampton Cottage) still stands at the corner of Elamang Avenue and Willoughby Street, Kirribilli. See Google street view (updated) : g.co/maps/56u6q

comment.author: 32162360@N00
32162360@N00
comment._content:
How could we have missed the "A C P 1898" signature and date before ?!
Sometimes you can;t see the wood for the trees.  See note bottom right.

comment.author: 47201412@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Well spotted. Always pays to revisit these old photos.

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Hmmm - The supposed photographer was Arthur "J" Phillips, not "C".  I am not sure of the mechanics of writing on glass plate negatives - do you have to write in reverse?  Is the C intended to be a J ?

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum] Thanks Kathy.  When I saw the letters, my first instinct was that it was a reversed 'J'.  And in the excitement of discovery, I thought "Arthur C. Phillips" was the right name,  perhaps subconsciously thinking of Arthur C. Clarke (?!),  hence my subsequent "Hmmm ... " comment above.   I think it is simply a mistaken 'J'.  Try writing your own initials and the year reversed - it is not easy!

I had a look at several other Phillips Collection photos in the hope of finding more initials and dates scratched in the corners, but nothing so far.   A work in progress ...
